column1: #Text=Here are some other reasons why she may have lost:1.
#Text=Played tricks to win the nomination in the first place (Sanders should have won)3.
#Text=People are tired of the old guard (has it worked for them?)
#Text=No real message: Working together to build a stronger America, same old same old6.
#Text=Pretending that everything is just fine for everyone, when it clearly isn't7.
#Text=Wall st. insiderTrump, like Rob Ford, simply said that things are broken, which they are!
#Text=You can't live in the US on minimum wage, these are the jobs that are left!
#Text=I am not a Trump supporter, but you have to agree that her candidacy was just about how great she is.
#Text=But what are you offering to the public, and do they believe you?
